headline: Textron Announces Appointment of Lisa Atherton as its President and CEO and as a Member of the Board, Effective January 4, 2026; Scott Donnelly Appointed Executive Chairman of the Board
summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I., October 22, 2025--Lisa Atherton appointed Textron President and CEO and member of the Board effective January 4, 2026; Scott Donnelly appointed Executive Chairman.

raw.summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I., October 22, 2025--Lisa Atherton appointed Textron President and CEO and member of the Board effective January 4, 2026; Scott Donnelly appointed Executive Chairman.

headline: Textron to Post Q3 Earnings: Here's What's in the Cards
summary: TXT's Q3 results are likely to get a lift from strong sales in Aviation, Bell and Systems, driving revenue and earnings growth expectations.

headline: Textron (TXT) Q3 Earnings Report Preview: What To Look For
summary: Aerospace and defense company Textron (NYSE:TXT) will be reporting earnings this Thursday before market open. Here’s what investors should know.
